title: Pentagon Seeks Bids From Four Tech Firms for JEDI Replacement; Outcome represents a win particularly for Amazon, which lost the original JEDI contract to Microsoft
text:
The Pentagon eventually canceled the JEDI project (short for Joint Enterprise Defense Infrastructure) and said it would start over with a new project called the Joint Warfighter Cloud Capability. It has said the new project likely would be a multibillion-dollar procurement.

The Pentagon didn't immediately say why IBM Corp., which had been viewed as another possible participant, wasn't included.

Pentagon Seeks Bids From Four Tech Firms for JEDI Replacement
